plot: What would you do if your best friend's new fiancee turned your stomach, and there wasn't enough Pepto Bismol in the world to make it any better?
title: Sucker for Shelley
plot_es: What would you do if your best friend's new fiancee turned your stomach, and there wasn't enough Pepto Bismol in the world to make it any better?
plot_en: What would you do if your best friend's new fiancee turned your stomach, and there wasn't enough Pepto Bismol in the world to make it any better?
